00041 namespace Hypertable {
00042 
00046   struct LocationCacheKey {
00047     uint32_t    table_id;
00048     const char *end_row;
00049   };
00050 
00054   inline bool operator<(const LocationCacheKey &x, const LocationCacheKey &y) {
00055     if (x.table_id != y.table_id)
00056       return x.table_id < y.table_id;
00057     if (y.end_row == 0)
00058       return (x.end_row == 0) ? false : true;
00059     else if (x.end_row == 0)
00060       return false;
00061     return strcmp(x.end_row, y.end_row) < 0;
00062   }
00063 
00067   inline bool operator==(const LocationCacheKey &x, const LocationCacheKey &y) {
00068     if (x.table_id != y.table_id)
00069       return false;
00070     if (x.end_row == 0)
00071       return (y.end_row == 0) ? true : false;
00072     else if (y.end_row == 0)
00073       return false;
00074     return !strcmp(x.end_row, y.end_row);
00075   }
00076 
00080   inline bool operator!=(const LocationCacheKey &x, const LocationCacheKey &y) {
00081     return !(x == y);
00082   }
00083

00089   public:
00092     struct Value {

00097       const char *location;
00098       bool pegged;
00099     };
